amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 118-419 to require the bill's annual report on the usage of real property be made publicly available on an accessible website run by the General Services Administration with exceptions for national security.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the McCormick amendment (A005) Agreed to by voice vote.
